name: TheVentures
description:
TheVentures is a seed-stage investor building a vibrant community of entrepreneurs. Changseong Ho and Jiwon Moon founded the company in 2014 upon the mission they gained from an experience of Viki — a company they co-founded now claiming 22 million users, was acquired by Rakuten for $200 million in 2013.

As a major connector of Korean startup scene with an exceptional track record, TheVentures believes in universal access to resources of innovation — technology, human expertise, and fund.
